Task:
1) Create a tiny local git repo in the current directory:
   - `mkdir -p dummy_repo && git init dummy_repo`
2) Initialize a hands-on session under $HUMAN_MATERIAL_PATH for that repo:
   - `python human/hands-on-learning/scripts/init_hands_on_session.py ./dummy_repo --slug dummy --session test`

Then verify these files exist:
- `$HUMAN_MATERIAL_PATH/research/dummy/hands_on/test/reports/INDEX.md`
- `$HUMAN_MATERIAL_PATH/research/dummy/hands_on/test/reports/environment.md`
